summary: I WILL BE ACCELERATING  FROM A STOP POSITION OR CRUISING IN TOWN AT 40 MPH OR ON THE INTERSTATE AT 75 MPH AND MY TRANSMISSION WILL RANDOMLY SLAM INTO A LOWER GEAR CAUSING MY TIRES TO OCCASIONALLY LOCK UP.  MY SPEEDOMETER WILL SIMPLY STOP WORKING, MY DIGITAL DASH DISPLAY WILL DISPLAY DASH MARKS INSTEAD OF NUMBERS AND ALSO DISPLAY A WRENCH ICON.  THEN ONCE I PULL THE VEHICLE OVER AND TURN IT OFF FOR A MINUTE, EVERYTHING WILL RETURN TO NORMAL.
